title: React calculator application
description: This is a React calculator application teaching the use of React`s Context Provider which allows sharing certaing values from a parent component to child components

title: React movie catalogue application
description: This is a very simple React application to display the use of useState, useEffect and fetch API with search functionality implemented

title: React monsters rolodex application
description: This is a React application which I developed during my Udemy React studies, it teaches me how to use react components lifecycle, useEffect, useState and the power of custom components

title: React weather application
description: This is a React application to retrieve weather data using axios instead of fetch API and show the data based on your location or parameters which the user inserts
